short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add some functionalities to debug occ

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple OCC (Oracle Commerce cloud) debugger for developers.
Includes features like:
- Tagging debugging
- Cookies debugging
- Topics debugging
- Spinner debugging
- Devtools panel for knockout inspection
- Knockout data serialization
